content.rendered:
Directed by Satish Vegesna.

Written by Satish Vegesna.

Cast Sharwanand(Raju). Anupama Parameswaran(Nithya (as Anupama Parameshwaran)). Prakash Raj(Raghavaraju). Jayasudha(Janakamma). Indraja(Jhansi, Nithya’s mother). Raja Ravindra(Nithya’s father). Himaja(SubbaLakshmi). Ravi Prakash(Raju’s friend). Praveen(Raju’s friend). Prabhas Sreenu(Raju’s friend). Shiju(Raju’s uncle). Dil Raju(A cameo appearance). Tanikella Bharani(Chalaram) .Mahesh Achanta.Chalapathi Rao.Koushik Mahata. V.K. Naresh((as Naresh)).Racha Ravi.Pammi Sai.Sithara.K. Venkat Sriram. Kasi Vishwanath((as Kasi Viswanath))

Language Telugu.

Producers Dil Raju. Harshith Reddy. Sireesh.

Production Sri Venkateswara Creations.
